tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE healthcare_data_trends (
  patient_id UUID,
  patient_name VARCHAR(50),
  age INT,
  gender VARCHAR(10),
  diagnosis VARCHAR(100),
  treatment VARCHAR(200),
  block_hash VARCHAR(64),
  block_number INT,
  timestamp TIMESTAMP,
  PRIMARY KEY (patient_id)
);

CREATE TABLE healthcare_data (
    patient_id UUID,
    patient_name VARCHAR,
    diagnosis VARCHAR,
    treatment_plan VARCHAR,
    admission_date DATE,
    discharge_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE research_studies (
    study_id UUID,
    study_name VARCHAR,
    researcher_name VARCHAR,
    start_date DATE,
    end_date DATE,
    funding_source VARCHAR
);

CREATE TABLE healthcare_data (
	healthcare_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	patient_name VARCHAR(50),
	diagnosis VARCHAR(100),
	admission_date DATE,
	treatment_cost INT,
	blockchain_id INT
);

CREATE TABLE research_data (
	research_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	researcher_name VARCHAR(50),
	topic VARCHAR(100),
	timestamp TIMESTAMP,
	evidence TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE decision_data (
	decision_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	decision_maker VARCHAR(50),
	decision_type VARCHAR(50),
	decision_date DATE,
	approval_status BOOLEAN
);

CREATE TABLE patients (
    patient_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    patient_name VARCHAR(50),
    age INT,
    gender VARCHAR(10),
    medical_history TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE doctors (
    doctor_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    doctor_name VARCHAR(50),
    specialization VARCHAR(50),
    hospital_id UUID,
    join_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE clinics (
    clinic_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    clinic_name VARCHAR(50),
    location VARCHAR(100),
    total_doctors INT,
    total_patients INT
);

CREATE TABLE appointments (
    appointment_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    patient_id UUID,
    doctor_id UUID,
    clinic_id UUID,
    appointment_date TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE patient_records (
  patient_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  first_name TEXT,
  last_name TEXT,
  gender TEXT,
  date_of_birth DATE,
  diagnosis TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE physician_records (
  physician_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  first_name TEXT,
  last_name TEXT,
  specialization TEXT,
  phone_number TEXT,
  email TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE hospital_records (
  hospital_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  hospital_name TEXT,
  location TEXT,
  rating FLOAT,
  number_of_beds INT
)

CREATE TABLE research_data (
  research_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  topic TEXT,
  description TEXT,
  start_date DATE,
  end_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE blockchain_transactions (
  transaction_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  sender_address TEXT,
  receiver_address TEXT,
  amount DECIMAL,
  timestamp TIMESTAMP
)
